channel.title: Diamond Mining on AIXWIM
channel.description: Recent content in Diamond Mining on AIXWIM

item.title: How Diamonds Are Mined: Understanding the Mining Methods
item.description: Learn about the two main methods of diamond mining: Pipe Mining and Alluvial Mining, and how diamonds make their way from the earth to your jewelry.

item.title: Are Diamonds Really Rare? Understanding the Rarity of These Precious Stones
item.description: Explore the truth about diamond rarity, from the mining process to market demand, and learn why diamonds are truly special and valuable.
